name: FranklinConnection
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: This skill is the voice-activated module of Franklin Connection of Pasco, Wash. It will provide news headlines daily from Franklin County, Pasco and the greater Tri-Cities and surrounding communities. To access the news from your Alexa device, you'll need to enable the skill in your Alexa app. Once enabled, it will be added to your Flash Briefing. You can access it by saying, "Alexa, what's my flash briefing," or "Alexa, what's in the news."
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
